name: Cultist Of The Sith Eternal
text: Include only if you have a Sith on your team. Before this character is defeated, deal 2 indirect damage to an opponent. Power Action - Move up to 2 damage from a Sith to this character.

name: Emperor's Royal Guard
text: After this character is dealt indirect damage for the first time each round, you may discard a card from your hand to remove a die not showing damage.

name: Mother Talzin
subtitle: Witch Of Dathomir
text: After you activate this character, heal 1 damage from this character for each of its character dice showing a value that is an odd number. Power Action - Resolve one of your character dice showing a value that is an odd number, rerolling it instead of removing it.

name: Ochi Of Bestoon
subtitle: Sith Order Assassin
text: Piloting. You cannot play Blue abilities on this character. After setup, choose an opponent's character. After you resolve this die showing damage, deal 1 damage to the chosen character.

name: Snoke
subtitle: Genetic Strandcast
text: After this character is defeated, return him to play flipped and ready. If this character is elite, make it elite. Power Action - Deal 1 damage to this character to roll a die on an ability on this character into your pool.

name: Sith Citadel Laboratory
text:
This support enters play with 2 resources on it.
After the action phase ends, remove 1 resource from this support. Then, if there are no resources on this support, place 5 damage on this support and flip it.

name: Poison Dart
text:
Discard this downgrade from play if you do not control a witch.
After attached character's character die is resolved, deal 1 damage to attached character.

name: Apology Accepted
text: Defeat one of your unique Red leader characters to ready a Sith character.

name: Desecration
text: Spot a Blue character to deal damage to a character equal to half the value showing on one of its character dice rounded up. Then turn that die to a side showing a blank.

name: Magical Ichor
text: Spot a witch to play an event from an opponent's discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1 and spotting that opponent's cards as if they were yours.

name: No Room For Failure
text: Your character dice cannot be rerolled. Action - Resolve one of your character dice, increasing its value by 1.

name: Night Buzzard
text:
Your Kylo Ren has Piloting.
Before you resolve this die showing damage, you may deal 1 indirect damage to yourself to increase its value by 1.

name: Ichor Sword
text:
While this upgrade is on a witch, it gains Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade, you may discard a card from your hand that costs an odd number to roll this die into your pool.

name: Sith Dagger
text:
Redeploy.
This card cannot be discarded from play except due to uniqueness.
Before an opponent's effect defeats attached character, they may move this upgrade to one of their hero characters.

name: Lorth Needa
subtitle: Incredulous Captain
text: After you activate this character, resolve each of this character's character dice, if able. Otherwise, remove them. Power Action - Search your deck or discard pile for a capital ship, reveal it and add it to your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.

name: Rukh
subtitle: Noghri Assassin
text:
Guardian.
After you turn or remove an opponent's die, you may resolve one this character's character dice showing damage increasing its value by 1.

name: Soontir Fel
subtitle: Baron Of The Empire
text: Piloting. After this character begins piloting a vehicle, choose one of that vehicle's support dice and either give a character shields equal to that die's value or remove shields from a character equal to that die's value.

name: Thrawn
subtitle: Military Strategist
text: After setup, choose a color. After a card of the chosen color leaves an opponent's hand, place 1 resource on this character. Action - Remove two resources from this card to turn an opponent's die of the chosen color to any side.

name: Espionage
text: Look at an opponent's hand. You may remove a die showing the same value as the cost of a card in that opponent's hand.

name: Only Stormtroopers Are So Precise
text: Resolve one of your trooper or weapon dice showing ranged damage as unblockable.

name: Scanning Crew
text: Name a card. Then search an opponent's deck for a copy of the named card and set that card aside. Shuffle that deck.

name: Shield Recharge
text:
Ambush.
Deal 1 unblockable damage to one of your characters to give it 2 shields.

name: You're Far Too Trusting
text: Spot a Red leader to resolve an opponent's die not showing damage.

name: Losing The War
text: Action - If all opponents' characters have a combined remaining health of 3 or less, set this plot aside to win the game.

name: Imperial-Class Star Destroyer
text:
This card's cost cannot be decreased.
This support can be activated.
After you activate this support, roll 3 set aside TIE Fighter (ATG31) dice into your pool. You may gain 1 resource.

name: Scout Trooper
text: After you activate this support, you may look at the top 2 cards of an opponent's deck. Discard one of those cards and add the other card to that opponent's hand.

name: Siege
text:
Each opponent's hand size is decreased by 1.
After an opponent claims the battlefield, set this support aside.

name: 125-Z Treadspeeder Bike
text: After you activate this support, you may activate a trooper. While you have a trooper character die in your pool, increase the value of this die by 1.

name: Architect Of War
text:
Leader character only.
[special] - Discard the top 2 cards of an opponent's deck.
[special] - Deal 3 damage to a character.

name: Black Krrsantan
subtitle: Ferocious Gladiator
text: After an opponent resolves a character die showing damage against this character, deal 1 damage to that die's matching character. Power Action - Roll one of this character's character dice into your pool and resolve it. If a character is defeated this way, ready this character.

name: Cornelius Evazan
subtitle: Mutilator Of Milvayne
text: After this character is defeated, each opponent may gain 2 resources and draw 2 cards. Power Action - Remove one of your dice to remove an opponent's die.

name: Ponda Baba
subtitle: Aqualish  Thug
text: After this character is defeated by an opponent, discard your hand. Power Action - Reroll this character's character dice. Then you may remove one of this character's character dice and spend 1 resource to discard a weapon or equipment from play that costs equal to or less than the value of that die.

name: Sy Snootles
subtitle: Unpredictable Pa'lowick
text: Charm. (After you activate this character, you may place 1 charm token on a character.) Power Action - Remove 2 charm tokens from an exhausted character to roll one of that character's character dice into your pool.

name: Most Wanted
text: Play only if you spot a bountyhunter. After an opponent activates attached character, you may force them to choose and discard a card from their hand.

name: E Chu Ta!
text:
Play only if an opponent removed one or more of your dice during their last turn this round.
Remove an opponent's die showing a value of 2 or less.

name: Prizefighter
text:
Ambush.
Remove one of your Yellow character or upgrade dice showing damage to deal damage equal to its value to 2 characters.

name: Swindle
text: Spot a scoundrel to resolve a die showing a cost for free (yours or an opponent's).

name: Underworld
text: Action - Exhaust this plot and remove one of your dice to play a Yellow card from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.

name: Desolate Deed
text: After you remove a die, place 1 damage on this support. Action - Discard this support to discard an opponent's support that costs less than or equal to the number of damage tokens on this support.

name: Nikto Sand Riders
text: After you activate this support, you may exhaust an opponent's support unless that opponent gives you 1 resource.

name: Remnant Stormtrooper Cell
text: After you activate this support, you may place 1 resource on it. Power Action - Remove 2 resources from this support to ready it.

name: 8d8
text: Action - Set this support aside to play a droid or equipment from your discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.

name: Vibroknuckle Duster
text:
Ambush.
After this die deals damage to an opponent's character, that opponent may not take the resolve dice action during their next turn this round.

name: Ben Solo
subtitle: Free Of Torment
text: Guardian. Action - Defeat this character to heal 3 damage from one of your characters, or 5 damage instead if that character is Rey.

name: Beru Lars
subtitle: Luke's Guardian
text:
After you activate this character, you may play a Blue card from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.
After you claim the battlefield, you may draw 1 card. Spot Owen Lars to heal 1 damage from a character.

name: Rey
subtitle: Jedi In Waiting
text: Power Action - Choose one: - Remove 3 Jedi support dice from your pool and spend 2 resources to flip this character. - Roll a Jedi die on one of your cards in play into your pool.

name: Rey
subtitle: All The Jedi
text: After you activate this character, roll a set-aside Luke Skywalker (AWK35) die into your pool. If this character is elite, roll a set-aside Leia Organa (RED39) die into your pool. Power Action - Resolve one of this character's character dice to heal damage from this character equal to the value showing on that die.

name: Yoda
subtitle: Patient Jedi Master
text: Power Action: Play a Blue card from your discard pile. Then, if that card is an event, set that card aside. [special] - Move 1 damage from a card to another card, or 2 damage instead if you played a card from your discard pile this round.

name: In Harmony
text:
Play only if you have dice showing shields and special.
Renew 1
Remove an opponent's die showing a value of 2 or less.

name: Luke's Offer
text: Choose and do one of the following: - Play a weapon from your hand or discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1. - Give a character 1 shield, or 2 shields instead if you spot a Yellow character.

name: Proficient Attack
text:
Renew 1
Resolve one of your Blue dice showing damage. Give a character 1 shield, or 2 shields instead if this card was played from the discard pile.

name: Seeking Answers
text: Choose a symbol. Then draw a card for each of an opponent's dice showing the chosen symbol, to a maximum of 3.

name: The Way Of The Jedi
text: Spot a Blue character to remove an opponent's die showing damage. You may spot a Jedi and spend 1 resource to remove an opponent's die not showing damage.

name: Greed Can Be A Powerful Ally
text: After an opponent gains 1 or more resources during the action phase, place resources on this support equal to the amount of resources that opponent gained. Action - Remove 5 resources from this support and spend 2 resources to ready a Blue character. Set this card aside.

name: Jedi Temple Guards
text: After you play this support, make it elite. Power Action - Reroll a die (yours or an opponent's).

name: Luke Skywalker's Spirit
text: Discard this support from play if you control Luke Skywalker. Power Action - Resolve one of your Blue dice showing a shield as if it were melee damage.

name: Legacy Lightsaber
text:
While this upgrade is on a Jedi, it gains Redeploy.
Before you resolve this die showing damage, you may remove 1 shield from a card to increase this die's value by 1.

name: Qui-Gon Jinn's Teachings
text:
Blue character only.
Before attached character gains 1 or more shields, you may remove 1 of attached character's shields to deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.

name: Finn
subtitle: Risk Taker
text: After you resolve a die showing reroll, deal 1 damage to a character.

name: Jannah
subtitle: Defected Stormtrooper
text: After setup, you may play a set-aside Red villain weapon upgrade on this character, decreasing its cost by 1.

name: Kallus
subtitle: Fulcrum
text: After you reveal one or more cards in an opponent's hand, deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent. Power Action - Reveal your hand to reveal an opponent's hand. You may play an event in that opponent's hand, if able. That opponent may play an event from your hand, if able.

name: Leia Organa
subtitle: The Princess
text: Charm. Power Action - Remove 2 charm tokens from a character to reveal the top card from that character's controller's deck. You may play that card for free, if able. Otherwise discard it to discard cards from that player's deck equal to that card's cost.

name: Tallissan Lintra
subtitle: Protecting The Peace
text: After an opponent activates a vehicle, you may activate this character. After you activate this character, roll a set-aside A-Wing (CON82) die into your pool, or 2 A-Wing dice instead if this character is elite.

name: Behind Enemy Lines
text: Spot a spy to reveal an opponent's hand. Then you may discard a card from your hand to play an event in that opponent's hand.

name: Code K-One-Zero
text: Remove 3 of your dice to end the action phase and switch the battlefield with a battlefield that is not being used (but was brought to the game) and use its claim ability. Set this event aside.

name: Contingency Plan
text: Spot a unique Red character to reveal the top 3 cards of a deck. You may play an event revealed this way.

name: Deploy
text: Activate one of your characters or supports. Then, if you have fewer dice in your pool than an opponent, you may activate one of your characters or supports.

name: Lightspeed Skipping
text: Chose a piloted vehicle die you control. If at the end of your opponent's next turn that die is in your pool, remove 2 of an opponent's dice.

name: Venator-Class Star Destroyer
text:
This card's cost cannot be decreased.
This support can be activated.
After you activate this support, roll 2 set aside ARC-170 Starfighter (WoTF129) dice into your pool. You may draw 1 card.

name: R5-D4
text: Discard this support if it has 3 or more damage on it. Action - Exhaust this support and place 1 damage on it to do one of the following - - Draw 1 card. - Turn a die to a side showing a value of 1.

name: Tantive IV
text: After you activate this support, you may activate a Red vehicle you control.

name: Finn's Glie-44 Blaster Pistol
text: Redeploy. Power Action - Turn this die to a side showing reroll and resolve it. Then you may spot 2 Red characters or Finn to roll this die back into your pool.

name: Cobb Vanth
subtitle: The Marshal
text:
Guardian.
After you activate this character, you may resolve one of its character or upgrade dice showing ranged damage.

name: Owen Lars
subtitle: Moisture Farmer
text: Power Action - Search your deck for a droid or location and play it, decreasing its cost by 1 if you spot Beru Lars. Shuffle your deck. After you claim the battlefield, you may give a character 1 shield.

name: Sabine Wren
subtitle: Mandalorian  Warrior
text: Power Action - Resolve up to 2 of your dice showing a disrupt as if they were showing indirect damage. [special] - Deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's characters. Reroll this die instead of removing it.

name: The Armorer
subtitle: Wise Leader
text: [special] - Give this character 1 shield and turn a weapon die to any side. Then, if it was your weapon die, you may resolve it. If it was an opponent's weapon die, deal 1 damage to a character.

name: Zorii Bliss
subtitle: Spice Runner Of Kijimi
text: Piloting. After you resolve a vehicle die showing a resource, deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent. If that vehicle was piloted, deal 1 damage to a character.

name: Get Around
text: Discard the top card of any deck. Then reroll any number of dice up to the cost of that card.

name: So Long, Sky Trash
text:
Play only if you have dice showing indirect damage and resources.
Deal 1 damage to a character and gain 1 resource.

name: This Is The Way
text:
Play only if all characters on your team share a color or subtype.
Remove an opponent's die.

name: Din Djarin's N-1 Starfighter
text:
Your Din Djarin has Piloting.
[special] - Take up to 2 additional actions.
[special] - Resolve another side of this die.

name: Partisan U-Wing
text: Power Action - Roll a partisan die on a card you control into your pool.

name: Sabine's Westar
text:
Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade on Sabine Wren, you may spend 1 resource to make this upgrade elite.

name: Insurgent Group
text:
Include only if each character on your team is a partisan.
Each partisan you control has +1 health.
You may include up to 4 cards of any affiliation or color in your deck (following other deckbuilding restrictions).

name: Blue Milk
text:
All players gain 1 resource. Choose and do one of the following:
- Place this card on the bottom of your deck.
- Heal 1 damage from a character.

name: Lightsaber Feint
text: Ambush. Remove one of your Jedi or Sith dice to activate one of your Blue characters.

name: Methodical
text: Resolve one of your Blue dice not showing damage to remove an opponent's die showing damage.

name: Bestoon Legacy
text: This support enters play exhausted. This card does not ready during the upkeep phase. Power Action - Spend 1 resource to ready this support, or discard a card from your hand and spot Ochi of Bestoon to ready this support.

name: Force Assistance
text: After you roll this die into your pool, you may turn a die to a side showing the same symbol as this die. Action - Exhaust this upgrade to roll this die into your pool. [special] - Give a character 1 shield.

name: Monastery
subtitle: Mortis
text: Power Action - Reveal the top card of your deck. Then you may play that card (paying its cost). Otherwise, discard it to give a character 1 shield.

name: Presence
text: Spot a capital ship to remove a die.

name: War Is Inevitable
text:
Play only if you have dice showing ranged damage and focus.
Turn a die to any side. Deal 1 damage to a character.

name: Strategic Discipline
text:
Your deck limit is increased by 4.
After you play an event, you may exhaust this plot to draw a card.
After you play a non-event card, you may ready this plot.

name: Special Operative
text: Power Action - Remove this die to remove an opponent's die showing the same symbol and value.

name: Standard Issue Blaster
text:
Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade or it is moved to a character, you may roll this die into your pool.

name: Death Star II Wreckage
subtitle: Kef Bir
text: Claim - Set aside a support from a discard pile to gain 1 resource.

name: Boba Fett
subtitle: Daimyo Of Tatooine
text: You may include up to 4 Yellow villain cards and up to 4 Yellow hero cards in your deck. After you play a Yellow card, place 1 resource on this character. Power Action - Remove 2 resources from this character to roll one of his character dice into your pool.

name: Garsa Fwip
subtitle: Respected Twi'lek
text: Charm. (After you activate this character, you may place 1 charm token on a character). Power Action - Remove 1 charm token from a character to turn one of that character's character dice to any side.

name: Cheap Shot
text:
Ambush.
Resolve one of your dice showing a value of 1 as if it were showing ranged damage.

name: Sabacc
text: Force all players to reveal the top 3 cards of their deck. The players whose revealed cards total the highest combined cost without exceeding 7 gain 2 resources. %(If all players exceed 7, no players gain resources).%

name: Tusken Camp
text:
Play only if you spot a Yellow character.
After you activate this support, roll 2 set-aside Tusken Raider (AWK22) dice into your pool. Then you may remove one of your character dice to gain 1 resource.

name: Gaderffii
text:
While this upgrade is on a Yellow character, it gains Redeploy.
[special] - Remove an opponent's die.

name: The Dune Sea
subtitle: Tatooine
text: After an opponent takes the reroll dice action for the first time each round, you may force them to choose and discard another card from their hand.

name: Figrin D'an
subtitle: Bith For Hire
text: Charm. (After you activate this character, you may place 1 charm token on a character). Power Action - Remove 2 charm tokens from a character to resolve one of that character's character dice without removing it from the pool.

name: Anticipation
text:
Spot a character that is 18 or more points to roll one of its character dice into your pool.
Before this card is revealed or discarded from your hand by an opponent's effect, you may play this card for free.

name: Charm Offensive
text: Remove 1 charm token from a character to remove a character die.

name: Dank Farrik
text:
Play only if an opponent removed 1 or more of your dice during their last turn this round.
Renew 0.
Reroll all dice.

name: Harvest
text: Spot a location to claim the battlefield, even if an opponent has claimed it this round. Then gain 2 resources.

name: Mad About Me
text: Ambush. Spot a musician to place 1 charm token on a character.

name: Solitary
text:
Play only if you have exactly one character in play.
Remove an opponent's die. Then, if you control the character with the least remaining health, you may remove a die not showing damage.

name: Krayt Dragon Bones
text: Action - Exhaust this support to reveal a random card in an opponent's hand. If that card's cost is: 0: Turn a die; 1: Discard the top card of a deck; 2: Gain 1 resource; 3: Remove a die.

name: Moisture Farm
text: Action - Exhaust this support and resolve one of your dice showing a resource to draw a card.

name: The Modal Nodes
text: Charm. (After you activate this support, you may place 1 charm token on a character.) Power Action - Spot Figrin D'an to turn one of your dice to a side showing a resource.

name: IB-94 Blaster Pistol
text: Ambush. Action - Exhaust this upgrade to give attached character 1 shield.

name: Substrata
subtitle: Glavis
text: Power Action - Reroll an opponent's character die. Reroll one of your character dice. Then deal 1 damage to the character whose die just rolled the lowest value (you choose in the case of a tie).
